How Our Beach Cleanup Impacted 500+ Locals

25 Apr 2025

How Our Beach Cleanup Impacted 500+ Locals


Caption: Volunteers at Sunnyvale Beach, April 2025.

On April 15, 2025, our team of 50 volunteers gathered at Anse Police Beach for a community cleanup. Here‚Äôs what we accomplished:

Key Results

  • ‚úÖ 200kg of trash removed (60% plastic waste).
  • ‚úÖ 500+ locals educated about marine conservation.
  • ‚úÖ 12 local businesses partnered for future initiatives.

How We Organized the Event

  1. Recruitment: Promoted via social media and flyers.
  2. Logistics: Provided gloves, bags, and recycling bins.
  3. Education: Held a short workshop on plastic pollution.

"This cleanup showed how small actions create ripple effects."
‚Äî Maria S., Volunteer Coordinator

Lessons Learned

  • Engage early: Partner with schools next time.
  • Track metrics: Weigh trash by category for better data.
  • Celebrate wins: Shared results on Instagram (#AnsPoliceCleanup).
